name: Squirrelville
description:
Squirrelville is a short Australian adventure where you play as a cheeky squirrel stranded on mountainous 'Acorn Island' in the midst of their annual Acorn Festival. In order to mutually help a local koala retrieve the Giant Acorn from the summit, you must climb, eat, and roll all the way to the peak, overcoming all the obstacles that lie in your way and form an unexpected friendship.

Use your unique squirrel moveset to maneuver the island

  • Climb up and around obstacles, jumping from platform to platform in increasingly intrepid situations as you get higher up the mountain
  • Eat all the acorns you can, eventually growing to a ball!
  • Roll up, down and around, using ramps and your own ingenuity to pick up speed. What will happen if you get the giant acorn...?

Australian Paradise

  • Explore a lovingly crafted low-poly island
  • Listen to a chilled beach soundtrack
  • Meet a friendly koala, and become friends!

Check out our website here: https://squirrelville.bearlyhumans.com/

Follow us on our socials: https://linktr.ee/BearlyHumans
